outputs.output_descr: The objective of this project is to phase-out the consumption of 76.3 ODP Tonnes of CFC 11 and CFC 12 used in the manufacture of Metered Dose Inhalers (MDIs) in Bangladesh by 2011.  To be able to achieve this goal, the Multilateral Fund is providing assistance to the three local manufacturers of MDIs in Bangladesh to convert the production form using CFC to using HFA 134a.  The assistance provided will comprise technical assistance and the provision of equipment.

project_descr: Phase-out of CFC consumption in the Manufacture of Metered Dose Inhalers (MDIs) in Bangladesh
project_title: Phase-out of CFC consumption in the Manufacture of Meter
